description: Shots will penetrate enemy Block Stances, dealing 50% of the usual Damage
The maximum amount of Ammo you can carry increases by 10%
Weapon Spread and Recoil are reduced by 20% and Ranged Damage against Terminus-level enemies is increased by 15% for Bolt Sniper Rifles and Stalker Bolt Rifles
Headshot Damage increases by 10% for all Squad Members
Manually activating Camo Cloak removes negative Status Effects and restores all Contested Health
When you are reviving a Squad Member, Camo Cloak hides you and the Squad Member for 5 seconds without spending Charge. Cooldown is 30 seconds.
When Camo Cloak deactivates, you take 20% less Health Damage, do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits, and cannot be knocked back for 10 seconds
After a perfectly timed Dodge, Camo Cloak automatically activates without spending Charge for 5 seconds. Cooldown is 30 seconds.
Melee Damage increases by 20% against Majoris-level and higher enemies
Remaining stationary for 2 seconds increases your Ranged Weapons' Damage by 20%
Bolt Carbines reload 20% faster, and their Weapon Spread and Recoil are reduced by 15%
Weapon Spread is reduced by 25% and Ranged Damage against Extremis-level enemies is increased by 15% for all Squad Members
Camo Cloak increases movement speed by 20%, and manually activating Camo Cloak automatically reloads Ranged Weapons
The first Ranged Attack that breaks Camo Cloak deals 75% more Damage
After performing an attack that breaks Camo Cloak, you remain hidden for 2 seconds
When you receive Lethal Damage, Camo Cloak automatically activates without spending Charge and you become Invulnerable for 5 seconds. Cooldown is 180 seconds.
You revive Squad members 30% faster
Reloading while having Low Ammo or manually activating Camo Cloak increases Melee Damage by 25% for 10 seconds
Killing more than 1 enemy with one shot from a Las Fusil restores its charge by 1
A Headshot kill restores Ability Charge by 10% for any Squad Member
A Headshot kill restores Camo Cloak's Charge by 5%
The first Melee Attack that breaks Camo Cloak deals 150% more Damage
When Camo Cloak deactivates, it startles nearby enemies. They will temporarily lose control or get knocked back. Cooldown is 25 seconds.
Performing 3 consecutive Headshots restores Equipment Charge by 1. Cooldown is 30 seconds.
